mapper.update: update np_product_ware set ware_stock=#{stock,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id=#{stockid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(th.id) from (select goods_info_name as goodname,goods_info_item_no as number,ware_id as wareid,ware_name as warename,ware_stock as stock, pp.third_id as third, pp.goods_info_id as id,g.goods_belo_name as storename ,id as stockid from (select infos.third_id, infos.goods_info_id ,infos.goods_info_name,infos.goods_id,wares.id, wares.ware_id,wares.ware_name,infos.goods_info_item_no,wares.ware_stock from np_goods_info infos, (select product_id,ware.ware_id,house.ware_name,ware.ware_stock ,ware.id from np_product_ware ware,np_warehouse house where ware.ware_id=house.ware_id and ware.del_flag='0') wares where infos.goods_info_id = wares.product_id and infos.goods_info_delflag='0' ) as pp left join np_goods g on g.goods_id = pp.goods_id where (select sw_value from np_sys_stockwarning)>ware_stock
and goods_info_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
and goods_info_item_no =#{searchText}
and goods_info_name like CONCAT('%',#{goodsName},'%')
and goods_info_item_no like CONCAT('%',#{goodsNo},'%')
GROUP BY number ) th
